metadata.name: Pytest Test Suite
metadata.description: Comprehensive pytest test suite with fixtures and parametrize

content:
import pytest
from fastapi.testclient import TestClient
from main import app

client = TestClient(app)

@pytest.fixture
def sample_item():
    return {
        "name": "Test Item",
        "description": "A test item",
        "price": 10.99
    }

class TestItemAPI:
    def test_create_item(self, sample_item):
        response = client.post("/items/", json=sample_item)
        assert response.status_code == 200
        data = response.json()
        assert data["name"] == sample_item["name"]
        assert "id" in data

    def test_read_item(self, sample_item):
        # Create item first
        create_response = client.post("/items/", json=sample_item)
        item_id = create_response.json()["id"]

        # Read item
        response = client.get(f"/items/{item_id}")
        assert response.status_code == 200
        assert response.json()["id"] == item_id

    def test_read_nonexistent_item(self):
        response = client.get("/items/99999")
        assert response.status_code == 404

    @pytest.mark.parametrize("price", [0.01, 100.00, 9999.99])
    def test_item_prices(self, price):
        item = {
            "name": "Price Test",
            "description": "Testing prices",
            "price": price
        }
        response = client.post("/items/", json=item)
        assert response.status_code == 200
        assert response.json()["price"] == price

    def test_update_item(self, sample_item):
        # Create item
        create_response = client.post("/items/", json=sample_item)
        item_id = create_response.json()["id"]

        # Update item
        updated_item = {
            "name": "Updated Item",
            "description": "Updated description",
            "price": 20.99
        }
        response = client.put(f"/items/{item_id}", json=updated_item)
        assert response.status_code == 200
        assert response.json()["name"] == "Updated Item"

    def test_delete_item(self, sample_item):
        # Create item
        create_response = client.post("/items/", json=sample_item)
        item_id = create_response.json()["id"]

        # Delete item
        response = client.delete(f"/items/{item_id}")
        assert response.status_code == 200

        # Verify deletion
        get_response = client.get(f"/items/{item_id}")
        assert get_response.status_code == 404
